name: Monster Jam Steel Titans 2
overview: Monster Jam Steel Titans 2 features more fan-favorite trucks in brand new Monster Jam worlds. Brand new online multiplayer modes, 38 trucks to choose from and five new outdoor worlds! Drivers train at Camp Crushmore and compete in authentic stadiums to become the ultimate champion. Truck roster features 38 of the greatest trucks in Monster Jam history, including Higher Education, Sparkle Smash and Grave Digger. Five all-new Monster Jam Worlds that expand the Monster Jam universe! Explore and uncover Monster Jam secrets. Compete just like the pros in 12 authentic stadiums and game modes inspired by the real-world shows
